seniority_level.evidence: No specific years mentioned, but complex responsibilities in data modeling, quality management, and multiple orchestration tools suggest mid-level experience

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Data Engineer' and core responsibilities focus on data pipelines, modeling, and processing

sub_specialty.evidence: Title includes '(모델링)' meaning modeling, and responsibilities emphasize data modeling, quality management, and workflow orchestration

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of team leadership, direct reports, or mentoring responsibilities - pure individual contributor role focused on technical execution

primary_cloud.evidence: No specific cloud provider mentioned in the job posting or Pass 1 extraction

secondary_clouds.evidence: No cloud providers mentioned at all

processing_paradigm.evidence: Mentions CDC (Change Data Capture), user behavior events, and search data which suggests real-time streaming, plus batch processing for data warehouse development

orchestrator_category.evidence: Airflow explicitly mentioned as required skill, along with Luigi, Dagster, and Prefect - all workflow orchestration tools

storage_layer.evidence: Mentions data warehouse development as nice-to-have skill, and Databricks which often uses warehouse patterns

remote_restriction.evidence: Location specified as Seoul, South Korea with onsite work model, indicating must be in South Korea

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: Korean company location suggests no student visa support, no mention of international candidates

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time permanent position at Korean company suggests W2 employment structure

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Requirements are reasonable for a mid-level data engineer role - SQL, Python, orchestration tools are standard expectations
